輔仁大學.definition: Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学; Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan

輔具.definition: assistive device (walking frame, hearing aid etc)

輔助.definition: to assist; to aid; supplementary; auxiliary

輔大.definition: abbr. for 輔仁大學|辅仁大学[Fu3 ren2 Da4 xue2]

輔導.definition: to give guidance; to mentor; to counsel; to coach; to tutor

輔導班.definition: tutorial class; remedial class; preparatory course

輔幣.definition: fractional currency (coin or note of value smaller than the country's unit of currency); token (used instead of money for slot machines etc)

輔弼.definition: to assist a ruler in governing a country; prime minister
